text: Here we applied this approach to test the efficacy of the 222 - nm far - UVC light to inactivate influenza A virus ( H1N1 ) carried by aerosols in a benchtop aerosol UV irradiation chamber , which generated aerosol droplets of sizes similar to those generated by human coughing and breathing . Aerosolized viruses flowing through the irradiation chamber were exposed to UVC emitting lamps placed in front of the chamber window .
